Projects & Work

Online Book Shop

    Made with:

An Online Book Shop. Users can see the all the books that are for sale. Users can register and login (authentication with jwt) and put their own books to sell, or to buy others user's books. Users also can save books to cart to but later

Live Code

Simple Slack Clone

    Made with:

A simple Slack Clone build with react lets users to authenticate with google account via firebase api. Authenticated users can create chat rooms, and send messages.

Live Code

TAKI Game

    Made with:

Console application written in c that implements the israeli TAKI game logic. The application takes input for number of players and each player can make a move based on the cards he has is his hand until there is a winner.

Live Code

Todo App

    Made with:

Developed a Todo app that uses redux with redux-toolkit and rtk-query. The app is containarized with docker that has a data volume for PostgreSQL container and the data will be saved until containers are rebuild or deleted.

Live Code
